reviews.review_text: I have always enjoyed hunt and find games but not all hidden object games are winners. Lost Lands: The Golden Curse...is indeed a winner in all respects. The graphics, atmosphere and playablilty of the game are outstanding...but what sets it apart for me is the storyline. Great Job!
I absolutely love this series of games! Worth every penny.
Good mix of easy and challenging puzzles. Brilliant graphics.
love the graphics and the story line.
love the stories and hope to complete all the series good puzzles and love the morphing loads of fun
